attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I petition the prime minister to go back to basics.
To give us a health service on needs.
To give us a pension not on means tests.
To allow Teachers to teach and administer relevant punishment as required. 
For traffic wardens to be fair and considerate.
For the police to police as they used to.
For all product packaging to be reduced.
For all councils to look at how they can improve their travel and road infrastructure. 
For youths to have more respect.
To close any obvious loopholes for parking offences that allow individuals or councils to make money  for supposed illegal parking that has occurred.
To reduce the need for speed cameras where the there is no just reason.
To allow us to be upset with a service ie: doctors or any other service with out the police being called, thereby limiting your ability to justifyably complain.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
